data.title: Medical Malpractice and Compensation in South Africa
data.meta_description: Medical Malpractice and Compensation in South Africa was published in Medical Malpractice and Compensation in Global Perspective on page 397.
data.text:
Coetzee, L.C. and Carstens, Pieter. "Medical Malpractice and Compensation in South Africa". Medical Malpractice and Compensation in Global Perspective, edited by Ken Oliphant and Richard W. Wright, Berlin, Boston: De Gruyter, 2013, pp. 397-438. https://doi.org/10.1515/9783110270235.397
